abstractText: Correction to: Nature Nanotechnology https://doi.org/10.1038/s41565-021-01021-z, published online 16 December 2021. This Letter was originally published with an incorrect copyright status, and should have been Open Access; this has been amended and the Letter is now published under a Creative Commons license CC BY 4.0. If material is not included in the article’s Creative Commons license and your intended use is not permitted by statutory regulation or exceeds the permitted use, you will need to obtain permission directly from the copyright holder. sections.text:
Correction to: Nature Nanotechnology https://doi.org/10.1038/s41565-021-01021-z, published online 16 December 2021.
This Letter was originally published with an incorrect copyright status, and should have been Open Access; this has been amended and the Letter is now published under a Creative Commons license CC BY 4.0.
Open Access This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License, which permits use, sharing, adaptation, distribution and reproduction in any medium or format, as long as you give appropriate credit to the original author(s) and the source, provide a link to the Creative Commons license, and indicate if changes were made. The images or other third party material in this article are included in the article’s Creative Commons license, unless
indicated otherwise in a credit line to the material. title: Author Correction: A light-fuelled nanoratchet shifts a coupled chemical equilibrium
